testcase.name: user Login In The Login Page
testcase.system-out: Given user Launch The Application...........................................passed When user Enters The UserName In UserName Textbox...........................passed And user Enters The Password In Password Textbox............................passed Then user Click On Login Button And It Navigates To Next Page...............passed

testcase.name: user Books Hotel In Search Hotel Page
testcase.system-out: When user Selects The Location..............................................passed And user Selects The Hotel..................................................passed And user Selects The Room Type..............................................passed And user Selects The Number Of Rooms........................................passed And user Enters The Check In Date...........................................passed And user Enters The Check Out Date..........................................passed And user Selects Number Of Adutls Per Room..................................passed And User Selects Number Of Childern Per Room................................passed Then User Clicks On Search And It Navigates To Next Page....................passed

testcase.name: user Selects Hotel
testcase.system-out: When user Selects The Hotel Through CheckBox................................passed Then user Clicks On Continue And Navigates To Next Page.....................passed

testcase.name: user Books The Hotel By Giving Personal Informations
testcase.system-out: When user Enters First Name in Textbox......................................passed And user Enters Last Name in Textbox........................................passed And user Enters Address in Billing Address Textbox..........................passed And user Enters Credit Card Number In Textbox...............................passed And user Selects Credit Card Type..........................................passed And user Selects Expiry Month From Drop Down................................passed And user Selects Expiry Year From Drop Down.................................passed And user Enters Cvv Number In TextBox.......................................passed Then user Click on Book Now Button And Navigates To Next Page...............passed
